= Weighted Round Robin =

  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weighted_round_robin WRR description]
  * Process' weight is loaded from its TCB's T_PRIO
  * Process is chosen when it is next in TASKTAB and its T_FLAG is set to 0
  * If there are no ready processes, jump to __no_dis_task 
  * Loop in __no_dis_task, until interrupted
  * If process terminates before using all of its time slices, the rest are added to the next process' time
  * Q_LEFT contains the remaining time for current task  
  * At init  Q_LEFT = 0
